full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI MCHOD PHRENG NANG MCHOD DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI CHAS 'BUL MCHOD SPRIN DANG BCAS PA 'DI RANG NYID MOS PAS PHYAG MTSAN SOGS GSANG BSKRUN GYI 'BUL TSIG RTZO 'DOD YOD PA NYE CHER RTA NAG SDEB LUNG SHAR BA'I RIGS BRGYUD SLOB BU DBU MDZAD PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I RKYAN GYIS, DAM PA'I MING 'CHANG BAS BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GIS SO,, ,,)
